thread.title: KIIS FM's Jane Hall announces departure after slump in breakfast radio ratings
thread.title_full: KIIS FM's Jane Hall announces departure after slump in breakfast radio ratings

author: Ebony Bowden
title: KIIS FM's Jane Hall announces departure after slump in breakfast radio ratings
text:
Matt Tilley and Jane Hall host KIIS FM's breakfast program. 
﻿ Matt Tilley and Jane Hall lead the breakfast charge KIIS FM's Matt Tilley targeted by Amy Schumer KIIS breakfast presenter Jane Hall has announced she will leave her show with Matt Tilley at the end of the year to focus on a return to acting.
In a statement on Friday morning, Hall said she wanted to spend more time with her daughter and had been mulling the decision for some time despite only joining the show at the start of the year.
Jane Hall previously hosted the Mix drive show with Chrissie Swan. 
"After much thought, I've decided to move on from my position as co-host of the KIIS Breakfast show," she said.
Advertisement "I made this decision for several reasons, not the least of which is my desire to be more present on the home front, especially with the teenage years fast approaching!"
Hall has one child with former partner actor Vince Colosimo.
Matt Tilley and Jane Hall with drive hosts Katie Langbroek and Dave Hughes. 
The news comes as a double-blow to KIIS, with Matt and Jane slumping a massive 1.3 points in this week's radio ratings, finishing sixth in the breakfast timeslot.
Australian Radio Network content director Duncan Campbell confirmed a replacement for Hall has been found and would be announced in the coming weeks.
"Several months ago Jane let us know that she would like to take time out personally next year and also return to acting," Mr Campbell said.
If looks could kill ... Amy Schumer was unimpressed with KIIS FM hosts Matt Tilley and Jane Hall. Photo: Supplied 
"Since then, we've been planning her replacement to work alongside Matt Tilley. This person has now been confirmed and we will be announcing in the coming weeks."
Hall previously hosted KIIS' Chrissie and Jane  drive program with Chrissie Swan before Swan was famously dumped at the end of 2014 as part of KIIS' rebranding from Mix 101.1.
Hall was promoted to the morning program with Matt Tilley, but told Fairfax her debut had been "difficult" .
"She [Swan] was an incredibly popular figure and still is and she has an enormous following … it was hard to not read a lot of positive press surrounding my appointment but instead negative press around her lack of contract."
"I'm still on a massive learning curve and that has only been highlighted by starting to work with someone like Matt. 
"He is a legend … I'm really not exaggerating when I say it's a great honour to be working with him."
Before entering radio, Hall had a four-year stint on Neighbours as Rebecca Robinson.
Tilley said he was sad about Hall's depature but was 'happy to support her decision'.
"I'm now looking forward to driving past her house at 4.30am each morning with a gentle reminder "toot" of what she's missing out on," he said.
